name: Trebuchet
description: A massive counterweight siege engine that hurls heavy projectiles over great distances. The Trebuchet can't hit targets within 60 feet of it. It takes two actions to load and fire: Load (action), Fire (action).

actionsToOperate.description: Two creatures use their actions to winch the throwing arm into firing position and load a stone into the sling.
One creature uses its action to release the counterweight.
